articles.title: IRCTC to resume e-catering services at select stations from 1 Feb - Mint
articles.description: Due to onset of the Covid-19 pandemic and the consequent unprecedented lockdown, e-catering services were suspended on March 22 last year.IRCTC had started this unique service in the year 2014
articles.content:
"The company will resume E-catering services at a selected number of stations (62 stations) in first phase w.e.f. 1 February 2021 onwards," the IRCTC said in a statement on Friday.
